name: Mousville Villain
description: A game (jam) me and FLAMINGxFURY made for the ACM Game Jam of Fall 2021. We had two weeks, and this is what we ended up with. The theme was "it's not a bug, it's a feature", which is how we got the mouse movement to work. You try to get to the cheese, which on completion generates a new level, adds more time, and slows down the mouse.
